7.Pros: It will be the easiest job to do.Generally you can get along with the people.Always can change hours.Great for younger kids.
7.Cons: Very stressful.Lack of help.Management will talk behind your back.Management will not do their job correctly.Management can't do most of the jobs that are required by most employees.Management Isn't knowledgeable.Management will try to dig into personal life.Co-workers talk all day instead of doing job.Management will mess up and blame the workers for it.Most Managers aren't qualified for the job.Management gets an appreciation party/Day while workers get nothing.No Paid Vacation.No paid sick leave.Benefits are so expensive it's impossible to get on your pay.No future in moving up.Generally have to work with kids younger than you and it can get pretty annoying real fast.Management rather you be a person who shows up to work every day even if you are deathly sick and doesn't care if you make the customers or other employees sick.

8.Pros: Good food , half off food , & lovely co workers
